pages.text: An item used to copy configuration data from one machine to another.$(p)To copy data to the card, $(k:sneak) + right click on the source machine, then right click the destination machine. Chat messages will inform you of the success/failure.$(p)Supported machines: $(l:block/digital_miner)Digital Miner$(/l), $(l:energy_cubes)Energy Cubes$(/l), $(l:block/formulaic_assemblicator)Formulaic Assemblicator$(/l), $(l:block/logistical_sorter)Logistical Sorter$(/l), $(l:block/oredictionificator)Oredictionificator$(/l), and any machine with configurable sides.
